value:
MPDL Services for researchers
We are here to help you! 
This section lists MPDL services for finalized datasets - services for data acquisition, safe data storage and collaborative working on data as they are generated were mentioned in the "During research" chapter. 
 
All services are available to Max Planck researchers and - upon invitation - their external collaboration partners. Your data will stay within the Max Planck Society.
 
Open data sharing
Edmond
DOI Service
Long-term archival (without open sharing)

Keeper (having a dual function, during and after research)
